tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Gotye- Somebody That I Used To Know (feat. Kimbra) Offical Music Video

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: u know i said the same﻿ thing about lana del rey songs....we must be soul mates
I heard this song and though it was Katy Perry and Sting. I searched﻿ google and this video came up I guess a lot of people think that.
thx﻿
Kimbra ﻿

this kid is obviously messed up in the head. first off go to his recent activity and you will see that he posted more than 4 comments on this video on different dates so, First off if he doesn't like the song﻿ why'd he watch it so many times? Second of all also under his recent activities are videos in Russian and Mexican.. this man obviously cannot be trusted D:
Göt ye ﻿
ULGY﻿ Singers
i love﻿ this song but there both ugly
"(feat.﻿ Kimbra)"
I﻿ wanna make love with Gotye.
no probleme﻿
he look a little bit stoned﻿ ... O.o
Well﻿ ya
Kimbra﻿

I love this song. It talks about the parts of the relationship that we hate to think about. There's always﻿ that possibility that when people break up, that they disappear out of each other's lives. This idea is almost more heart-breaking than having them hate you. You share all these memories and now you have to ignore them. Whether they are good or bad.
Oops I meant I love﻿ Gotye fangs!
Like to listen to the song without watching the video. Video puts﻿ me off! Having said that, still have to give credits to the creator of the video, because it is so different to the other videos!
I love Goyte﻿ fangs!
this video makes no sence xD﻿
I﻿ don't know..but she is naked :Me Gusta:
i love the﻿ song and this video
who is the﻿ girl singing with him?
